first-name.title: First Name
first-name.description: First name of the person, regular capitalization (e.g. Dr. Michael). Please do not use any language specific characters such such as ä,ö,etc

middle-names-opt.title: Middle Name(s)
middle-names-opt.description: Potential middle name(s) of the person. regular capitalization (e.g. Jebbediah). Please do not use any language specific characters such as ä,ö,etc.

surname.title: Surname(s)
surname.description: Last name(s) of the person. regular capitalization (e.g. Smith). Please do not use any language specific characters such as ä,ö,etc.

gender.title: Gender
gender.description: sex of the person. Write 'Mr' or 'Mrs'.

birth-date-adults-opt.title: Birth Date Adults
birth-date-adults-opt.description: Date of birth of the person, if they were born before 2007. In the format DD.MM.YYYY

birth-date-non-adults-opt.title: Birth Date non-Adults
birth-date-non-adults-opt.description: Date of birth of the person, if they were born after 2007. In the format DD.MM.YYYY

passport-number.title: Passport Number
passport-number.description: Passport number from the top part of the passport. Should not be longer than 10 characters.
